verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H4256>companies<s%> who <S%H8334>served<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> by <S%H4256>division,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and the rulers over all the <S%H7399>substance<s%> and <S%H4735>possessions<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> with the <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and the mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> even all the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H251>me,<s%> my brothers, and my <S%H5971>people!<s%> As for <S%H3824>me,<s%> it was in my heart to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4496>rest<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for the <S%H1916>footstool<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> and I had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H1129>building.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1129>me,<s%> 'You shall not build a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> because you are a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>'

However <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> me out of all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> For he has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to be <S%H5057>prince;<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father;<s%> and among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> he took <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in me to make me <S%H4427>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Of all my <S%H1121>sons<s%> (for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>), he has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>me,<s%> 'Solomon, your <S%H1121>son,<s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> and my <S%H2691>courts;<s%> for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> him to be my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and I will be his <S%H1>father.<s%>

I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> if he <S%H2388>continues<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>'

Now <S%H5869>therefore,<s%> in the sight of all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H1875>seek<s%> out all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> that you may <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and leave it for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5704>you<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H8010>You,<s%> Solomon my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with a <S%H2655>willing<s%> <S%H5315>mind;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1875>searches<s%> all <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> and <S%H995>understands<s%> all the <S%H3336>imaginations<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts.<s%> If you <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H4672>him,<s%> he will be found by <S%H5800>you;<s%> but if you forsake <S%H2186>him,<s%> he will cast you off <S%H5703>forever.<s%>

Take <S%H7200>heed<s%> <S%H3068>now;<s%> for Yahweh has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and do <S%H6213>it.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> and of its houses, and of its <S%H1597>treasuries,<s%> and of the upper <S%H5944>rooms<s%> of <S%H6442>it,<s%> and of the inner <S%H2315>rooms<s%> of <S%H1004>it,<s%> and of the place of the mercy <S%H3727>seat;<s%>

and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of all that he had by the <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%> for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for all the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> for the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and for the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944>things;<s%>

also for the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

of <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> for all <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of every kind of <S%H5656>service;<s%> for all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H4948>weight,<s%> for all <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of every kind of <S%H5656>service;<s%>

by <S%H4948>weight<s%> also for the <S%H4501>lampstands<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and for its <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and for its <S%H5216>lamps;<s%> and for the <S%H4501>lampstands<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and for its <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> according to the <S%H5656>use<s%> of every <S%H4501>lampstand;<s%>

and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of show <S%H4635>bread,<s%> for every <S%H7979>table;<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%>

and the <S%H4207>forks,<s%> and the <S%H4219>basins,<s%> and the <S%H4219>cups,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and for the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3713>bowls<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>bowl;<s%> and for the <S%H3701>silver<s%> bowls by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>bowl;<s%>

and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H2212>refined<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight;<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> that spread <S%H6566>out,<s%> and <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"All <S%H7919>this,<s%>" said David, "I have been made to understand in <S%H3791>writing<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even all the <S%H4399>works<s%> of this <S%H8403>pattern.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3372>it.<s%> Don't be afraid, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> even my <S%H430>God,<s%> is with <S%H7503>you.<s%> He will not fail <S%H5800>you,<s%> nor forsake <S%H4399>you,<s%> until all the work for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H3615>finished.<s%>

<S%H4256>Behold,<s%> there are the divisions of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> There shall be with you in all kinds of <S%H4399>work<s%> every <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H2451>man<s%> who has <S%H5656>skill,<s%> for any kind of service. Also the <S%H8269>captains<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> will be entirely at your <S%H1697>command.<s%>"
